name: "South Park" Season 2 - Part 1 Trivia Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: In "Not Without my Anus", what is the name of Terrance's daughter?
questions.explanation:
Sally.

	Sally is being held captive in Iran, so Terrance and Phillip go to help Sally there.  Terrance had the daughter with Celine Dion.

questions.text: In "Cartman's Mom is Still a Dirty Slut", who is Cartman's father?
questions.explanation:
His mother.

	Cartman's mother turns out to be a hermaphrodite, so she was Cartman's father.  Cartman decides to not know who his real mother is.

Officer Barbrady.

	The kids help Officer Barbrady learn to read so that they can discover what one of the South Park residents has been sleeping with chickens.  It turns out to be the weird bookmobile owner.

questions.text: Who gets fired from their job in "Ike's Wee Wee"?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Mackey

	Mr. Mackey is fired after he distributed drugs to the class.  He ends up becoming an alcoholic and a drug addict before the citizens put him into the Betty Ford Clinic.

questions.text: In "Conjoined Fetus Lady", what is the name of the school nurse?
questions.explanation:
Nurse Gollum.

	In the episode, South Park has a conjoined fetus awareness week and the town's dodgeball team becomes world champions.

questions.text: In "The Mexican Staring Frog of Southern Sri Lanka", who hunts for the frog?
questions.explanation:
Jimbo and Ned.

	Jimbo and Ned hunt for the frog after a few sightings were sent in by anonymous filmers.  It was actually the boys playing a prank who sent in the tapes.

questions.text: In "Flashbacks", who pursues a career as a stand-up comic?
questions.explanation:
Mrs. Crabtree

	In the end of the episode, it turns out that everything was Stan's dream.  None of the things in the episode actually happened.

questions.text: In "Summer Sucks", who is Mr. Hat's replacement after he disappears?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Twig

	Mr. Garrison loses Mr. Hat, so he frantically searches for him.  He ends up staying missing for almost the rest of the season.

questions.text: In "Chef's Salty Chocolate Balls", what occurs in South Park?
questions.explanation:
A film festival.

	The South Park Film Festival is running and the town gets filled with many people.  Mr. Hankey has to save the day by destroying the festival a la "The Sorcerer's Apprentice" segment of "Fantasia," but instead of water he uses sewage.

A tree falls on him.

	In "Chickenlover", Kenny nearly dies about three or four times until he is actually killed in the credits.
